relatedRecords.name: DroidconKE
relatedRecords.description: Droidcon is a global conference focused on the engineering of Android applications. Droidcon provides a forum for developers to network with other developers, share techniques, announce apps and products, and to learn and teach.

relatedRecords.name: ADDC - App Design & Development Conference
relatedRecords.description: Single-track international conference for iOS & Android designers and developers in Barcelona, Spain. App designers and developers around the world work side by side every day to build some of the most incredible and innovative applications. Yet our potential for synergy is so often overlooked. relatedRecords.name: iOSDevUK
relatedRecords.description: iOSDevUK started in 2011 as the UK’s first conference for iPhone developers, and has attracted hundreds of developers to Aberystwyth each year since then.
